document_data.name: Shining Falls Boat Rentals
document_data.mainbody: '''Shining Falls Boat Rentals''' was a shop in [[Loudwater]] in the [[Delimbiyr Vale]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: It stood on the bank of the [[Delimbiyr River]], opposite the [[Temple of Corellon Larethian (Loudwater)|Temple of Corellon Larethian]].
document_data.Services: In business by [[1358 DR]], the store rented out boats for use on the Delimbiyr. It was named after [[Shining Falls]], which were part of the Delimbiyr upstream of Loudwater.
